message: I have a unique opportunity for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell this exclusive product to you for $12,000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $10,500. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down a bit, but $10,500 is still a little higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $10,200. This is my final offer, and I'm ready to buy the product at this price.

I understand you're trying to squeeze the last bit of savings out of me, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,200, but I need to make a bit more profit. I can sell it to you for $10,500, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
